text:
Kwong Siu-hing, or sometimes Kwok Kwong Siu-hing (; born 1929), is the matriarch of the Kwok family.
She controls Sun Hung Kai Properties, the largest property developer in Hong Kong.
As of 2008, Kwong controls about 41.53% of SHK Properties' shares through a family trust, so she became the largest shareholder of the company.
